title: Will ELO get reset in the start of a new season , for example Season 7?
body: I have recently reached Gold V from Silver 4 and I tried to climb even more but I kept going back and forth and I ended up in 0 lp Gold V with Elo Hell mmr , Will it get reseted in the end of Season 6 ?

replies.body:
MMR soft resets at the start of each season, so you'll be lower than Gold V at season start, but you won't drop all the way back to the fresh ranked S3~ MMR. 

If you do well in placements next season you'll probs get placed S1, I got GV 12~ LP last season won 6/10 placements this season and got placed S1.
it resets to between 0 and your current mmr as i understand it.
